resources.string: CUPSLink: DroidPrint
http://server.tld:631/printers/Printer_Name
Printer Name
Add printer
Search for printers
Add a CUPS printer
Alternatively, you can enter a complete URI and printer name in the fields below
Server IP or host name
You can either auto-detect the printers from your server by entering its IP or host name below
Printer is not responding. Please check it is powered on and available at %1$s
Couldn\'t read document to be printed
The printer name cannot be empty
The printer URL cannot be empty
Untrusted SSL connection
Your server sent a certificate that was not trusted by your device. Please review the certificates details below, and choose whether you accept to trust it or not:

Issuer: CN=test-server
 Validity
 Not Before: Aug 21 19:36:21 2016 GMT
 Not After : Aug 19 19:36:21 2026 GMT
 Subject: CN=test-server
 Subject Public Key Info:
 Public Key Algorithm: rsaEncryption
 Public-Key: (2048 bit)
Trust connection
Abort connection
Certificates added to the trusted list. Please try again with this printer.
Couldn\'t save server certificates. Please review the application logs and submit a bug request to the developer.
HTTP Basic Auth
Your server sent a basic auth request, but we need you to give the credentials. Please fill them below:
Username
Password
Save credentials
Hostname %1$s not verified

This host presented an SSL certificate for which your device couldn\'t verify the hostname. All the printers served by this host will be disabled until you explicitly trust it. Please tell if you would like to trust this host or not:
Trust host
Abort
Host not verified
This host refuses plain HTTP, please use the HTTPS access
Couldn\'t find printer, is it available?
Couldn\'t query printer status: socket timeout. Please check network connectivity.
Couldn\'t query printer status: unknown host. Please check network connectivity.
Couldn\'t query printer status: network unreachable. Please check network connectivity.
The CUPS server indicated that we sent a bad request. This is either a bad configuration on the server, or a wrong URL. Please check both.
The printer name was not found on the server (HTTP 404). Please check its name.
Couldn\'t check job #%1$d status because the connection with the CUPS server was reset
Couldn\'t find job #%1$d, is it already finished?
Couldn\'t print document: socket timeout. Please check network connectivity.
Couldn\'t handle job: %1$s (%2$s)
Generic CUPS client
There are no manually entered printers. You can add one from the Settings app, in the Printing section.
Here are the manually added printers. Click on one item to remove it (no confirmation!)
Couldn\'t queue print job: %1$s
Couldn\'t parse URI: %1$s
Clear text traffic is no longer allowed in Android 9.0. Please enable SSL/TLS on the CUPS server/printer.
